sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
reflects someone's attitude or a situation
, kaže, da ima človek določeno stališče ali da se je znašel v določenih okoliščinah.

seg.quote: The choice of school reflected Dad's hopes for us.

sense.def:
To reflect light or heat
pomeni, da nekaj ne prepušča svetlobe ali toplote, ampak jo pošilja nazaj od sebe.

seg.quote: Unlike a normal fabric, it reflects heat back into the room.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is reflected in a mirror or in water
, je podoba tistega vidna v ogledalu ali vodi.

seg.quote: I saw street lamps mistily reflected in black water.

sense.def:
To reflect on something
ali
to reflect over something
pomeni temeljito razmišljati o tistem.

seg.quote: Rodin reflected long over Casson's argument.

sense.def:
To reflect that something is the case
pomeni vedeti, da je nekaj res, in razmišljati o tem.

seg.quote: Well, I reflected, I couldn't say I hadn't been warned.
